A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie killed the franchise in every possible way!! They really screwed it up!!I was not very happy with the direction of TFA but I thought it was still a decent movie. TLJ has too many things that don't work. The humour is way off and lame. The leia scene in space is absurd. But the thing that really ended for me is the decision to kill off Luke. For me Star Wars is finished. There is no vision. The story for the 3 movies should have been mapped out from the outset. Lots of people criticized George Lucas but at least his movies had scope\, great visuals and a fantastic imagination. Star Wars is gone!!!
